## SuggestionStateMatch interface

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export interface SuggestionStateMatch extends Pick<SuggestionMatcher, 'name' | 'char'>, SuggestionMatcherParams 
```

## Properties

|  Property | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  [query](./extension-mention.suggestionstatematch.query.md) | <code>MatchLength</code> | Current query of match which doesn't include the match character. |
|  [range](./extension-mention.suggestionstatematch.range.md) | <code>FromToEndParams</code> | Range of current match. - <code>from</code> is the start - <code>to</code> is cursor position - <code>end</code> is the end of the match |
|  [supportedCharacters](./extension-mention.suggestionstatematch.supportedcharacters.md) | <code>RegExp</code> | The characters that the matcher supports |
|  [text](./extension-mention.suggestionstatematch.text.md) | <code>MatchLength</code> | Full text of match including the activation character e.g. <code>'@awesome'</code>. |
